{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/title|operator{{=}}}}
{{cpp/memory/scoped_allocator_adaptor/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|scoped_allocator}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp; operator=( const scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|1=
scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp; operator=( scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp;&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ 显式预置的复制赋值运算符，它复制赋值基类（外层分配器 {{tt|OuterAlloc}}）和所有内层分配器。

@2@ 显式预置的移动赋值运算符，它移动赋值基类（外层分配器 {{tt|OuterAlloc}}）和所有内层分配器。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|另一 {{tt|std::scoped_allocator_adaptor}}}}
{{par end}}
